column1:
Overall, Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services and General have seen no variation in negative sentiment from 2020 to 2023, with all values being 0.0. Value has seen a consistent increases in negative sentiment from 2020 to 2023, due to increase in value from 0.0 to 0.0 respectively.

Given the data, it is clear that Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services and General, need to be improved to reduce their negative sentiment rates for all 4 years. Furthermore, Value requires a more comprehensive review of customer reviews to ensure positive sentiment values remain consistent. Possible efforts to improve customer sentiment in these categories may include providing rewards for customer loyalty, offering discounts and perks on products and services, and regularly introducing new and innovative features and services.
